item.description:
GET READY TO PARTEEEEEEE!!!!
Rooms still available, but not for long. RSVP now!

To see who else is coming, click here...

Only $112.50 per person double occupancy - this amazing price includes everything listed below!
This is the best price anywhere and they sell out every year!

* One Night stay (Friday night)
* Welcome reception appetizers & chocolates
* A chilled bottle of champagne in room
* Special New Yearâ€™s Eve Raffle items
* All you can eat Dinner Buffet
* Open Bar from 8:30 pm till close
* All you can eat Breakfast Buffet the next morning
* Music by DJ Joe Brady from Radio Station Cool 102
* Breakfast Buffet on Saturday
* Late check out (1 pm)

Check in any time after 1 pm. See itinerary below to start socializing with the group!
To reserve your spot, RSVP now. Roommates will be assigned.

If you want a single room, the cost is $175.00 per person and you can change the amount on the payment button when you RSVP.

Cancellation Policy
There is no cancellation refunds for this event because the hotel will sell out. However, if you need to cancel, you may try to sell your package to another meetup member or even a friend.

Itinerary These are approximate times.
1:00 pm Check In to Hotel (we have an early check-in)
2:30 pm Walk down Main Street with the group - browse the shops (meet in the Lobby)
4:00 pm Have fun socializing over complimentary appetizers at the hotel
5:00 pm Whatever you want: Relax in your room, get a massage (advanced appointments need to be made 50% discount), or hang out and socialize.
7:00 pm Dinner and New Years Eve Party
9:00 pm Music from DJ Joe Brady from Radio Station: Cool 102 Radio

Dress for the Party anything goes. It's not too fancy, but not too casual either. Whatever you would wear to a holiday party and feel comfortable in.

Saturday, January 1
Enjoy a hot breakfast buffet whenever you wake up
Enjoy a late check out (1 pm)
item.name: New Years Eve Party at the Cape!!!
